---
title: "Manifesto Project - Case Selection"
format: html
---

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false

library(dplyr)
df <- readRDS("greens_populists_periods.rds")
df |>
  group_by(countryname) |>
  summarise(number_of_manifestos = n()) |>
  knitr::kable()

df |>
  group_by(period) |>
  summarise(number_of_manifestos = n()) |>
  knitr::kable()
```
